Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: BNPP did not alter the excretion of APAP or any of its non - deacetylated metabolites nor did BNPP alter excretion of PAP or its metabolites after PAP doses of 150 and 300 mg / kg .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In this paragraph, the following "disease" entities are mentioned:

1. APAP (acetylated pyridinium): This is a metabolite of the drug paracetamol (APAP is the acetylated form of pyridinium).
2. PAP (pyridinium): This is the parent compound of APAP, which is the metabolite of paracetamol.

So, in this paragraph, we are discussing the effects of the drug BNPP (BNPP is not mentioned in the paragraph) on the excretion of these two metabolites after doses of 150 and 300 mg/kg of PAP.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities mentioned in the paragraph that refer to "Disease":

1. APAP (acetylated pyridinium)
2. PAP (pyridinium)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be classified as "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities mentioned in the paragraph that refer to "Disease":

| --- |
| APAP (acetylated pyridinium) |
| PAP (pyridinium) |
